messages.subject: behind?
messages.msgSnippet: My DH came home today and said that he had talked to a co-worker who had asked how old the boys are now. When he said, they are 3 1/2 , his co-worker said,
messages.messageBody:
My DH came home today and said that he had talked to a co-worker who had
asked how old the boys are now. When he said, "they are 3 1/2" , his
co-worker said, "they'll be starting school soon". He said "no, they aren't
going to pre-k". She said, "they'll be behind". He said "they already know
the alphabet and how to count to 30". She still said, "they will fall
behind". He just asked, "Behind what?" and dropped it there. I love my DH so
much. :-)
